mapper.select: select * from user u where u.UserId = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into user ( UserName, UserPassword, UserEmail, UserNickName, UserAddress, UserPhone, UserRemark, SexId ) values ( #{UserName}, #{UserPassword}, #{UserEmail}, #{UserNickName}, #{UserAddress}, #{UserPhone}, #{UserRemark}, #{SexId})
mapper.update: update user set UserName=#{UserName}, UserPassword=#{UserPassword}, UserEmail=#{UserEmail}, UserNickName=#{UserNickName}, UserAddress=#{UserAddress}, UserPhone=#{UserPhone}, UserRemark=#{UserRemark}, SexId#{SexId} where UserId = #{UserId}
